LanguageData.YadaritInhibit.label: YadaritInhibit
LanguageData.YadaritInhibit.description: Simple but effective way to cure food poisoning. Several doses of the drug are required until full healing. Caution, it could cause a diarrhea.

LanguageData.EggGold.description: An Golden egg of a Kukuha
